page.title: 02LIFE STYLES-ANDREW AGED 10
page.content: On Saturday 11th of May I got up at 7.15 am & went downstairs.I read a book & watched the T.V. until breakfast.For breakfast I had All Bran, Branflakes,orange & tea.After a wash I dressed and came down.I put on my shoes & coat,took three pounds from my money box & went shopping with my family. We went to Newcastle & parked in the Multi -storey car park.Then we went to the Roebuck centre & looked at the Lego toys in Boots where Dad bought a film for his camera.Then we went to John Menzies where I bought a toy.Later we went to Nanna's (my grandmother) for an hour.I had a drink of lemonade & a piece of cake.At home I had faggots, chips & peas for dinner.Later I watched Buck Rogers in the 25th Century (a film about a space hero) while eating salad. I played out with my friends & went to bed at 9 o'clock.
